Official TrailerPhotos13Top castEditClay TatumClayWhitmer ThomasWhitDeMorge BrownHippieBudd DiazBuddChristian Lee HutsonBelle's DateTeresa LeeBelleRobert LongstreetArnoldAnthony OberbeckChuckyAnna SereginaCabin CoupleChris ThayerCabin CoupleWhitney WeirWhitneyDirectorClay TatumWritersClay TatumWhitmer ThomasAll cast & crewProduction, box office & more at IMDbProMore like this6.8I Like Movies6.4Showing Up7.0Hannah Ha Ha6.7The Starling Girl5.5Biosphere7.1Therapy Dogs6.0Corner OfficeCash Cow6.6You Hurt My Feelings7.0How to Blow Up a Pipeline6.2Master Gardener6.7Beau Is AfraidStorylineEditUser reviews10ReviewReviewFeatured review6/10 A comfort feature and that's all about it.An exciting spin on undead beings, as it delineates the hardships of a deceased individual and, at the same time, the gradually unfolding events correlate to a living person and that propagates an unusual brotherhood that prospers amidst some unlikeliest circumstances.This was nothing too profound, though the story did attempt to touch upon some deeper stuff and tried its best to turn it into something that may culminate in introspection, but it couldn't.To me, it felt more like a comfort feature, movies you tune in with no preconceived expectations at all, you seek to take pleasure in the ride, and in that case, it would suffice, I reckon.P. S. I wouldn't say I liked the ending, though. It was so cruel!helpful•20SoumikBanerjee1996Jul 25, 2023Top picksSign in to rate and Watchlist for personalized recommendationsSign inFAQ18How long is The Civil Dead?Powered by AlexaDetailsEditRelease dateFebruary 17, 2023 (United States)Country of originUnited StatesOfficial siteDirector's websiteLanguageEnglishAlso known asМилейшие мертвецыSee more company credits at IMDbProBox officeEditGross US & Canada$32,346Opening weekend US & Canada$15,350Feb 12, 2023Gross worldwide$32,346See detailed box office info on IMDbProTechnical specsEditRuntime1 hour 44 minutesColorColorAspect ratio2.39:1Related newsContribute to this pageSuggest an edit or add missing contentTop GapBy what name was The Civil Dead (2022) officially released in Canada in English?AnswerSee more gapsLearn more about contributingEdit pageMore to exploreRecently viewedYou have no recently viewed pagesGet the IMDb AppSign in for more accessSign in for more accessGet the IMDb AppHelpSite IndexIMDbProBox Office MojoIMDb DeveloperPress RoomAdvertisingJobsConditions of UsePrivacy PolicyYour Ads Privacy ChoicesIMDb, an Amazon company© 1990-2024 by IMDb.com, Inc.Back to top

What to know
Critics Consensus
With a satisfying blend of humor and melancholy, The Civil Dead finds creative partners Clay Tatum and Whitmer Thomas taking a haunting look at the pitfalls of friendship.

title: The Civil Dead
text:
Prime Video: The Civil Dead
ITIl mio accountAccediThe Civil DeadClay is a loner photographer who enjoys a mundane life with his artist wife Whitney in Los Angeles. Whitney advises Clay to go out and be productive while she's out of town. While taking photos out in a park, Clay happens upon his long-lost friend, Whit. After a night of catching up, Whit discloses an unsettling secret to Clay, which causes him to question his own sanity.IMDb 6,21 h 43 min202316+Film d’essai·CommediaQuesto video non è attualmentedisponibile nel tuo Paese/RegioneAddLista VideoMi piaceNon fa per meShare AndroidCondividiDettagliDettagli Maggiori informazioni SottotitoliNon disponibileRegiaClay TatumProduttoriKasandra Baruch, Mike Marasco, Clay Tatum, Whitmer ThomasInterpretiClay Tatum, Whitmer Thomas, Whitney WeirProduzioneUtopiaFacendo clic su Riproduci accetti i nostri Termini di utilizzo.FeedbackInvia commentiSupportoOttieni assistenzaTermini di utilizzo e informativa sulla privacyInvia commentiAiuto© 1996-2024, Amazon.com, Inc. o società affiliate
